content: परा(रां)च् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ची|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Situated beyond or on the other side; ये चामुष्मात्परांचो लोकाः <ls>Ch. Up.</ls> {@--2@} Having the face turned away (पराङ्मुख); <ls>Śi. 18. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Unfavourable, adverse; दैवे पराचि <ls>Bv. 1. 105</ls>; or दैवे पराग्वदनशालिनि हंत जाते <ls n="Bv.">3. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Distant. {@--5@} Directed outwards. {@--6@} Turned away, avert ed. {@--7@} Departing or returning from. {@--8@} Inverted, reversed.
